00003 inline _dgematrix operator*(const dcovector& covec, const drovector& rovec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const dcovector&, const drovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010   dgematrix newmat(covec.L, rovec.L);
00011   for(long i=0; i<newmat.m; i++){ for(long j=0; j<newmat.n; j++){
00012     newmat(i,j) =covec(i)*rovec(j);
00013   }}
00014   
00015   return _(newmat);
00016 }
